body_html: The summarize this bug -- there's memory leak because tf.ones/tf.zeros use tf.constant. tf.constant doesn't deallocate it's memory by design. Recommended fix is to move tf.ones/tf.zeros to always tf.fill instead.
body_text: The summarize this bug -- there's memory leak because tf.ones/tf.zeros use tf.constant. tf.constant doesn't deallocate it's memory by design. Recommended fix is to move tf.ones/tf.zeros to always tf.fill instead.
body: The summarize this bug -- there's memory leak because tf.ones/tf.zeros use tf.constant. tf.constant doesn't deallocate it's memory by design. Recommended fix is to move tf.ones/tf.zeros to always tf.fill instead.
